ModMetaData.name: Faction: V.O.I.D. - HSK Edition
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Re-evaluate for a moment. Under what circumstances should you install this mod? None whatsoever.
Featuring the most beloved organization in the outer RimWorld. Always helping people find greener pastures. Ready to take on the world!
Adventure awaits. We at V.O.I.D. promise to look after you and your children because nobody else can. Always promoting a brighter tomorrow and a better world. You may be the next person selected to join our ranks!
Not feeling like being assimilated? Okay, how about becoming one of our honorary research subjects? Wherever you are, whatever you do, we will find you.
Credits to: Mehni - C# Coding Dninemfive - C# Coding Taranchuk - C# Coding Jecrell - C# Coding Morphium - .xml Fiendakko - Textures Tittymcswaggy - Textures Odz - Textures JangoD'Soul - Textures AOBA - Textures Neil Yates - Dead Frontier Greg Taylor - Original Dead Frontier artist Clayton - Dead Frontier artist V.O.I.D. - Major Anderson Cube instrumental - Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
SFX from: Scott Cawthon Valve Techland Creaky Corpse Ltd
Ko-Fi supporters, special thanks to these individuals for helping this mod leave beta: Alex TL Anonymous (Ko-fi supporter) Anonymous (Ko-fi supporter) The Last Eternal getodog BlueBottle
